summary: Simple texture replacer for the chef\'s suit and hat in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"lime\"]This mod is a tribute to the legendary modder Jargu[/color]
                                              [b]Link to original mod:[/b]
                    [url=7423]Troll Suit[/url]

        [color=\"blue\"]Simple texture replacer for the chef\'s suit and hat in Skyrim.[/color]

                                                     [u]Installation[/u]
                   [i]-Extract contents from the RAR downloaded into your Skyrim folder.[/i]
                                                   [i]-Yes to replace.[/i]
                                            [i]-Open Skyrim and enjoy it![/i]
author: Jargu Bulinguillo
